meanings.definition: A compound that is derived from xanthine and has a methyl group attached to its nitrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: The methylxanthine in this medicine helps to open up the airways.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning for its methylxanthine content.
meanings.sent3: The methylxanthine in the energy drink gave the sloth unexpected speed!
meanings.sent4: Her energy seemed to be fueled by a secret stash of methylxanthine.
meanings.sent5: The methylxanthine compound is like a key that unlocks energy in the body.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of compounds that includes caffeine and theobromine.
meanings.sent1: The methylxanthine found in chocolate can affect your mood.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the taste of methylxanthine in their favorite beverages.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be addicted to the methylxanthine in the tea leaves.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with the energy of methylxanthine after drinking the soda.
meanings.sent5: The methylxanthine compounds are like little bursts of energy waiting to be released.
